jobDescription: Are you experienced ? Waiting for the right opportunity? Then Miracle is the right place you can opt for. Here is an exciting job opportunity for the right candidate.  Looking for an experienced Microsoft Dynamics AX2012 to help with AX4 to AX2012 migration.  Should be an expertise in Finance, Supply Chain (T&L;) modules.  AX2012 Functional expert in Finance and Supply Chain modules - GL, AP, AR,  Fixed Assets, Inventory Management, MRP, Production etc.  System configuration as required.  Hands-on role to help with creating videos in AX2012 following our AX4  videos.  Training of end users.  Prepare training documentation as needed.  Provide pre and post go-live support.  Knowledge with Reporting Services is a PLUS
